lines.text: Ah, this town is so inspiring.
If only I had my easel with me; my mind is buzzing with artsy thoughts!
Just because I am partial to traditional painting methods doesn't mean that I don't like Porygon.
Its sharp edges remind me of cubist works.
I'm glad that Pokémon come in every color imaginable.
Vivid or desaturated, dark or light, it's like an explosion of hues.
I hear about this Team Aqua and Team Magma rivalry...
... and I think this all lacks in yellow. There should be a yellow team.
